title: Motorola is reportedly developing its first rollable smartphone
content:
Motorola entered the foldable segment in 2022 with the launch of the Motorola Razr. The company followed up with the Razr 5G, which brought improved cameras and beefier internals. While the next-gen Razr is already in the works and coming soon, the Lenovo-owned company is now looking to dip its toes into a whole new

The post Motorola is reportedly developing its first rollable smartphone appeared first on XDA.
description: According to Evan Blass (via 91Mobiles), Motorola is developing its first rollable phone, internally known as Felix. Read on.
